text: In high-pressure moments, I can calm myself within a few minutes.
I can sustain focus on one task for 20+ minutes without checking my phone.
I feel confident speaking up in important meetings.
I have a clear, authentic leadership style I can describe in 2-3 lines.
I bounce back quickly after setbacks.
I intentionally practice positive reframing when things go wrong.
I can connect my daily tasks to a larger purpose.
I often feel overwhelmed by daily responsibilities.
I struggle to maintain concentration during long work sessions.
I actively seek feedback to improve my communication skills.
My values guide my major decisions consistently.
I maintain a growth mindset even during failures.
